(n, q) = map(int, input().split())
graph = [set() for _ in range(n)]
start = [4294967295] * n
for _ in range(q):
    (i, j, x) = map(int, input().split())
    i -= 1
    j -= 1
    graph[i].add(j)
    graph[j].add(i)
    start[i] &= x
    start[j] &= x
for i in range(n):
    if i in graph[i]:
        continue
    val = start[i]
    for j in graph[i]:
        val &= start[j]
    start[i] ^= val
print(*start)
